reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Prof. Chen's passion for the subject is contagious. His programming assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson knows her stuff, but her lectures can be a bit dry. Exams are fair though.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez explains complex concepts clearly. His problem sets are tough but great for learning.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's passion for literature is inspiring. Her feedback on essays is incredibly helpful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable, but his teaching style is confusing. Labs are poorly organized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia brings history to life with her storytelling. Her exams can be challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's lectures are okay, but the pace is too fast sometimes. Lab sessions are well-structured.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is an excellent teacher and researcher. Her classes spark great discussions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Kim explains complex economic theories clearly. His real-world examples are very helpful.
